subject: Fw: Thank you for your recent application, we are ready to lend you money
body:
Your credit does not matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire TONIGHT):
$343,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this plain form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
http://tmgbood.com/
